name: Night Alone
description:
Introduction:

This is a very small game made within a month to celebrate this year's Christmas, so we hope you enjoy it!

Story:

A little boy is waiting for Christmas, when suddenly a surprised guest comes to visit him.

Gameplay:

W.A.S.D: Move

E: Interact

T: Turn on/off flashlight

Space: Skip dialogues

Esc: Pause

Author's Note:

Merry Christmas, everyone!
